text:
HyreCar | Los Angeles | Full Stack Engineers | On-site | Full Time | Interns ok | No Visa sponsorship Looking for strong Javascript developers. Willing to work at a startup where the product evolves very fast and constantly.
Our offices are located in WeWork downtown LA with beautiful views all year long. Free beer and cafe too.
We are a startup growing 20% month over month for an entire year and have a great revenue. A large part of that is because of our tech.
Feel free to reach out at abhi@hyrecar.com
